PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-17702008-11-20,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisDecision of the Governor in Council TO REFER BACK to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission for reconsideration and hearing the decisions, contained within Broadcasting Decision CRTC 2008-222, to approve the application for a broadcasting licence by Frank Torres, on behalf of a corporation to be incorporated, to operate an English-language commercial FM radio programming undertaking to serve Ottawa and Gatineau.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2008-0141 Publication Date: 2008-12-10
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Decision of the Governor in Council TO REFER BACK to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission for reconsideration and hearing the decisions, contained within Broadcasting Decision CRTC 2008-222, to approve the application for a broadcasting licence by Frank Torres, on behalf of a corporation to be incorporated, to operate an English-language commercial FM radio programming undertaking to serve Ottawa and Gatineau.
